org.sxb.http.converter.xml

クラス Jaxb2RootElementHttpMessageConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sxb.http.converter.AbstractHttpMessageConverter<T>
      • org.sxb.http.converter.xml.AbstractXmlHttpMessageConverter<T>
        • org.sxb.http.converter.xml.AbstractJaxb2HttpMessageConverter<java.lang.Object>
          • org.sxb.http.converter.xml.Jaxb2RootElementHttpMessageConverter
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    HttpMessageConverter<java.lang.Object>

    public class Jaxb2RootElementHttpMessageConverter
extends AbstractJaxb2HttpMessageConverter<java.lang.Object>
    Implementation of HttpMessageConverter that can read and write XML using JAXB2.

    This converter can read classes annotated with XmlRootElement and XmlType, and write classes annotated with with XmlRootElement, or subclasses thereof.

    導入されたバージョン:
    2.0
    作成者:
    Arjen Poutsma, Sebastien Deleuze, Rossen Stoyanchev, Jeffson

    • メソッドの詳細

      • setProcessExternalEntities

        public void setProcessExternalEntities(boolean processExternalEntities)
        Indicates whether external XML entities are processed when converting to a Source.

        Default is false, meaning that external entities are not resolved.

      • isProcessExternalEntities

        public boolean isProcessExternalEntities()
        Returns the configured value for whether XML external entities are allowed.

      • canRead

        public boolean canRead(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                       MediaType mediaType)
        クラスからコピーされた説明: AbstractHttpMessageConverter
        This implementation checks if the given class is supported, and if the supported media types include the given media type.
        定義:
        canRead インタフェース内 HttpMessageConverter<java.lang.Object>
        オーバーライド:
        canRead クラス内 AbstractHttpMessageConverter<java.lang.Object>
        パラメータ:
        clazz - the class to test for readability
        mediaType - the media type to read, can be null if not specified. Typically the value of a Content-Type header.
        戻り値:
        true if readable; false otherwise

      • canWrite

        public boolean canWrite(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                        MediaType mediaType)
        クラスからコピーされた説明: AbstractHttpMessageConverter
        This implementation checks if the given class is supported, and if the supported media types include the given media type.
        定義:
        canWrite インタフェース内 HttpMessageConverter<java.lang.Object>
        オーバーライド:
        canWrite クラス内 AbstractHttpMessageConverter<java.lang.Object>
        パラメータ:
        clazz - the class to test for writability
        mediaType - the media type to write, can be null if not specified. Typically the value of an Accept header.
        戻り値:
        true if writable; false otherwise
